Index.title: Hello world!
Index.presentation: .NET developer focusing on ReactJs/ NextJs and tailwind on the front-end and C#/.NET on the ack-end , I'm always looking for new experiences and learning for my professional and mainly personal development. Graduating in Information Systems, passionate about challenges and technologies, musician in his spare time.
Index.pretense: I am always looking to improve my knowledge according to market demand, in addition to being looking for Specialization in the .NET ecosystem and also in English fluency

descriptionCoffeeDelivery.feat1: Application of a fictitious coffee shop, which contains the following functionalities:
descriptionCoffeeDelivery.feat2: List of products (coffees) available for purchase
descriptionCoffeeDelivery.feat3: Add a specific quantity of items to the cart , Display total items in cart in Header
descriptionCoffeeDelivery.feat4: Increase or remove the quantity of items in the cart , Display the total value of the sum of items in the cart multiplied by the value
descriptionCoffeeDelivery.feat5: Form for user to fill in with validation

descriptionGitHubBlog.feat1: Application that consumes the github API, which contains the following functionalities:
descriptionGitHubBlog.feat2: Profile listing, picture, number of followers, name, and other information available via the GitHub API.)
descriptionGitHubBlog.feat3: List and filter all issues in the repository with a short summary of its contents
descriptionGitHubBlog.feat4: Create a page to display a complete post (issue)
descriptionGitHubBlog.feat5: Exibir sua foto no Gihub no blogue
